explains: n. 萨宾人；萨宾语；色宾河（美国得克萨斯州东部河流）
adj. 萨宾人的；萨宾语的

sentences.en: Sabine no longer does any news reporting for NBC.
The rape of the Sabine women is a case in point.
sentences.cn: 罗马人抢掠萨宾族妇女就是最好的例子。

sentences.en: A year after that conversation, Sabine left the relationship.
sentences.cn: 在那次对话一年之后，Sabine离开了。
